Articles.Content:
I'm sure most of you are familiar with Up Goer Five, and it not, [Here it Is!](http://xkcd.com/1133/)

And recently I found this fun little site which is an [Up Goer Five Text Editor](http://splasho.com/upgoer5/) which just spell checks your text using the same constraints.

Below is my attempt at explaining a scientific principle that as a Kerbal pilot you should be familiar with. So see if you can figure out below what that principle that I translated from wikipedia that I am referring to or to be more nerdy "Solve for Bright Person"

**Bright Person's Fact**

**Bright Person's fact can be used to figure out the lift force on a lift thing, if the what happens of the water stuff roll in the area of the lift thing is known.**

**A case, if the air rolling past the top area of an air fly car lift thing is moving faster than the air rolling past the bottom area, then Bright Person's fact gives idea that the air force on the area of the lift thing will be lower above than down side. This air force not same makes an up lifting force.**

**When the power of air move force past the top and bottom areas of a lift thing is known, the lift forces can be figured out (to a good almost figure) using Bright Person's fact.** 

[Link to My Solution](http://splasho.com/upgoer5?)

Well this is a good time to plug his new book, "Thing Explainer" which is a bunch more "Up Goer Five" style diagrams

"Touch these blue words to learn how to get Thing Explainer."

[http://blog.xkcd.com/2015/05/13/new-book-thing-explainer/](http://blog.xkcd.com/2015/05/13/new-book-thing-explainer/)

Heh, funny, I decided to make my own (yes yes you know what it is), copied from the websites explanation of kerbal space program, with some changes.

Green People Space Group is a lot of types game where the people who play green people space group make their own space group. In Green People Space Group, you must build a space car, possible of flying its people out into space, without killing them. You can use a lot of parts, which you use to make a space car that won't die. Each part has its own use and will make the way a space car flies (or doesn't). So get ready, and get ready to try some Space Car Hard Stuff! The game has different game types, you can play the Business Type if you want to manage your own Space Business, taking on things to do and learning new things. Or you can play Anything Type if you're only interested in flying and looking at the Green People land without needing money to buy space cars. There is even a middle point between these two, Learning Things Type.

And a shorter one which I just made without a guide:

Green People Space Group is a game where you send green people into space using large things that use fire to go FAST. You can send green people to places in space. They can put things on the space worlds. Or you can just fly things. It's up to you. Green People Space Group can be hard at times. However, the more you play Green People Space Group, you will be better.
